alert.note: Alert for Houston; Twiggs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 30 at 2:59PM EST until December 30 at 3:30PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Twiggs County in central Georgia... Northeastern Houston County in central Georgia... * Until 330 PM EST. * At 258 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Elberta, or 13 miles south of Macon, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jeffersonville, Warner Robins, Robins Air Force Base, Marion, Bullard, Elberta, Fitzpatrick, Ripley and Huber. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
